Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tax exemption and abatement for certain rehabilitated buildings as authorized by section 488-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Tax exemption and abatement for certain rehabilitated buildings as authorized by section 488-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exemption from taxation of alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exemption from taxation of alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.
